Description.Name: Thermo-Cyclic Heat Sinks
Description.Details: The Argo uses numerous conventional Heat Sinks in its power systems to manage heat generation. We can't replace them all without a layover in drydock, but replacing half with Future Tech Heat Sinks will increase cooling capability and help generate extra power.

AssignedCastDescription: Future Tech is truly amazing, Commander. With Thermo-Cyclic Heat Sinks, we're converting a decent chunk of waste heat into free energy. You won't have to worry about power management after this upgrade.
